findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens.

findings.title: Unsecured withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized access to dividends.

findings.title: Unsecured distributeDividends function
findings.description: The distributeDividends function lacks proper security measures.

findings.title: Unsecured _withdrawDividendOfUser function
findings.description: The internal function _withdrawDividendOfUser is unsecured and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unsecured renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function is unsecured and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes in ownership.

findings.title: Unsecured transferOwnership function
findings.description: The active smart contract owner has elevated impact to smart contract's safety and security due to unsecured transfer of ownership.
